me.name: Jerald Dagaang
me.desc: I am a motivated and versatile individual, always eager to take on new challenges. With a passion for learning, I am dedicated to delivering high-quality results. With a positive attitude and a growth mindset, I am ready to make a meaningful contribution and achieve great things.

projects.name: Chedx Website
projects.desc: CHEDx is a series of IT summits organized by the Commission on Higher Education (CHED) in the Philippines, in partnership with Asia Pacific College (APC). These events aim to bridge the gap between academia and the IT industry, fostering collaboration and ensuring graduates are equipped with the skills needed for the evolving digital landscape

projects.name: Prison Coin
projects.desc: PrisonCoin is a permissioned blockchain-based digital currency system tailored for use within correctional facilities. It enables a secure, accountable, and transparent financial environment for inmates, reducing risks associated with contraband trade and manual accounting.

projects.name: Multimodal Banana Panama Disease Detection System
projects.desc: This project aims to build a scalable, modular system for detecting Panama disease in banana plants using a combination of IoT sensors, edge computing, and image-based disease classification. It includes a web application, a mobile app, and integrated backend services.

projects.name: Prince School Supplies Inventory System
projects.desc: This project aims to build a scalable, modular system for detecting Panama disease in banana plants using a combination of IoT sensors, edge computing, and image-based disease classification. It includes a web application, a mobile app, and integrated backend services.

projects.name: Closeout Connection
projects.desc: Closeout Connection is a New York-based online store specializing in luxury, elegant homeware. We offer curated, high-quality housewares—from timeless décor to functional essentials—at exclusive closeout prices.

projects.name: PopStop E-Commerce Website
projects.desc: PopStop is a New Zealand-based online store where fans can buy and sell pop culture collectibles. Explore a wide selection of Pop Vinyl figures, collectible and premium action figures, and board games—all in one place.

experience.desc: Led a team to develop a booking system for Mapua Malayan Colleges Mindanao, digitalizing the process for students and faculty to easily reserve campus facilities. This system streamlined bookings, improving accessibility and efficiency for the university's operations.
The CHEDx2.O Event Website is a platform created to support the CHEDx2.O IT Education Summit, a national event that brings together schools, industries, and the government to improve IT education.
Developed a E-commerece website for a toy company in New Zealand using Shopify.
